senses.sense_definition: Проверять что-либо (например, программу, устройство, продукт) на работоспособность, качество или соответствие требованиям.

target_lang_translations.en: The developers are currently <w>testing</w> the new version of the app.

examples.text: Перед покупкой всегда старайтесь <w>тестить</w> товар, чтобы убедиться в его качестве.

target_lang_translations.en: Before buying, always try <w>to test</w> the product to make sure of its quality.

senses.target_lang_definition: To check something (e.g., a program, device, or product) for functionality, quality, or compliance with requirements. This is a colloquial term derived from the English word 'test'.

en.target_lang_sense_clarification: The most direct and common translation. Used for software, products, etc. It corresponds to the Russian colloquialism 'тестить'.
A more informal equivalent, often used when personally checking a product before buying. Implies a less formal or systematic process than 'to test'.
